sid.description: The unique identifier for the execution.

account_sid.description: The unique identifier for the account associated with the execution.

flow_sid.description: The unique identifier for the flow associated with the execution.

contact_sid.description: The unique identifier for the contact associated with the execution.

contact_channel_address.description: The contact channel address where the execution is targeted.

status.description: The status of the execution process.

context.description: Additional context or data related to the execution.

date_created.description: The date and time when the execution was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the execution was last updated.

url.description: The URL endpoint for accessing detailed information about the execution.

links.description: Contains related hypermedia links associated with the executions data.

execution_context.description: Link to the execution context data.

steps.description: Link to the steps involved in the execution.
